comment:
* A callback to be invoked when the system successfully delivers your {@link NdefMessage}
     * to another device.
     * @deprecated this feature is removed. File sharing can work using other technology like
     * Bluetooth.

methods.name: public void onNdefPushComplete(NfcEvent event)
methods.comment:
* Called on successful NDEF push. * *

This callback is usually made on a binder thread (not the UI thread). * * @param event {@link NfcEvent} with the {@link NfcEvent#nfcAdapter} field set
